= Introduction =

= Details =

1. Project Management
Project home : http://code.google.com/p/researcheresources/
Svn repo url: https://researcheresources.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/

2. Code Version Control. 

NCS.org code duoc quan ly bang SubVersion. 
Ban nen download phan mem [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ TortoiseSVN] cho windows de check-out/check-in code. Neu ban lan dau tien su dung SVN, [http://www.shokhirev.com/nikolai/programs/SVN/svn.html hay xem huong dan o day]

Ban can dang ky 1 gmail account, roi gui email cho project owner de add vao developer list. Sau khi tro thanh project member, ban vao phan [http://code.google.com/p/researcheresources/source/checkout Source] cua Google Code de generate password cho minh.

3. Install local servers
Ban can cai LAMP (Apache server, MySQL server, PHP, Linux is preferred,
but not required).
Tao virtual directory http://localhost/PaperShare tro vao thu muc
PaperShare vua check out.

4. Database
Please send an email to one of project owners de biet chi tiet

5. FTP server.
